snippet.title: FrankenStorm Prologue Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
FrankenStorm is a roguelite TD: all towers and enemies start the same, but you've one choice per wave which affects BOTH and stacks for dramatic variance. Gradually salvage save some choices to keep for future runs and build deeper strategies. Unique mazing challenge where structures must be linked to a power source

Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1672920
